title: Got the icon but..
body: I already own Kayle and Riot Kayle, I have for some time now. Yesterday I received the 10 year icon but did not get a mystery gift. Is anyone else having this issue? If gifts are still being distributed it seems like mines been sent, but not in full?.

replies.body: This is normal. Each account is not necessarily going to receive each gift simultaneously, so it's possible to get one without the other. If you absolutely know you have not received the mystery gift by the 23rd, then you can submit a support ticket.
Ah, I was under the impression they would be received simultaneously, thanks!

I'm glad Zombiemaster was able to give you the details on this.  Make sure to stay up to date through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) for updates.  Let me know if you have any questions!
